ygData.subject: AW: [eqbards] ...and the beat goes on...
ygData.msgSnippet: grats maravana! i guess i will never get my epic ;) tobi 51 nerfed songs tholuxe paells ... Von: RKR [mailto:rkroads@yahoo.com] Gesendet am: Donnerstag, 26.
ygData.messageBody:
grats maravana!

i guess i will never get my epic ;)

tobi
51 nerfed songs
tholuxe paells

-----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
Von: RKR [mailto:rkroads@...]
Gesendet am: Donnerstag, 26. Juli 2001 22:01
An: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Betreff: [eqbards] ...and the beat goes on...

Well, last night, after months of not even trying to work on it, I finished
my
Singing Short Sword quest. :) A guild-mate won a scale on a Vox raid a
couple
weeks ago, and that was the turning point for me. We had I think 9
consecutive
Vox kills with only 1 white scale dropped. It's been rough on MM ;p.

My guild, Deadly Virtues, took the spawned Trakanon down with no problems;
our
first Trak kill (like may other servers, it's difficult to find him up to
kill!). We had deaths, but learned a lot so that next time will be much
easier.

I am thrilled with the sword! I think that the effort for our epic is
proportional to its quality.

I wanted to share this with you all, with a hearty 'Thank you' because so
much
work has been done by the community, of which we are all a part.

/cheer bards

Maravana Vireo
59 Bard of Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr
